LanguageData.Hediffs_Cooking.label: Ryōri Knowledge
LanguageData.Hediffs_Cooking.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
